title: Dead City
description: On a beautiful early-fall evening a vagrant stumbles into Times Square and attacks a tourist, setting off a deadly chain of events that might just spell the end of civilization as we know it.Chris Collins is an ordinary guy caught up in an extraordinary world of flesh eating monsters, murderous hobos, a demented street thug who wants to be 'King of New York," and a mysterious hitman who may or may not be his friend.And then there's Ruby, just one day old but already equipped with teeth and nails, and a taste for pureed beef.
author: J.J. Zep
